{H} []You may have target Character switch Expeditions.  {R} If your Reserve is empty: [Sabotage].

{J} If you control a [[Fleeting]] Character: The next card you play this Afternoon costs {1} less.  {H} []You may have target Character or Expedition Permanent switch Expeditions.  {H} If you control a [[Fleeting]] Character: The next card you play this Afternoon costs {1} less.
{H} []You may have target Character or Expedition Permanent switch Expeditions.  {R} You may discard a Character from your Reserve. If you do: Target Character other than me gains 1 boost.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : [][Exhausted Resupply].

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} []You may have target Character or Expedition Permanent switch Expeditions.  {R} Roll a die. On a 4+: You may discard target Permanent.
{R} []You may have target Character switch Expeditions.  When my Expedition moves forward — If your hand is empty: You may discard target Permanent.

{H} You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: You may have target Character in the Expedition facing me gain [[Asleep]].  {R} []You may have target Character or Expedition Permanent switch Expeditions.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []You may return a card from your Reserve to your hand.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} []You may have target Character switch Expeditions.  {H} You may have me gain [[Fleeting]]. If you do: [Resupply].
{J} []You may have target Character switch Expeditions.  {H} If I'm the only Character in my Expedition: You may have target Character with Hand Cost {3} or less other than me gain [[Anchored]].
{J} []You may have target Character or Expedition Permanent switch Expeditions.  {J} If I'm the only Character in my Expedition: I gain 1 boost.
{J} []You may have target Character switch Expeditions.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Spell you play this turn costs {1} less.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} []You may have target Character switch Expeditions.  {R} []The next card you play this Afternoon costs {1} less.
{R} []You may have target Character switch Expeditions.  When I go to Reserve from the Expedition zone — If you control one or more Landmarks: Draw a card.
{H} []You may have target Character or Expedition Permanent switch Expeditions.  {R} If you control one or more Landmarks: You may send target Character to Reserve.
{J} []You may have target Character switch Expeditions.  {R} []Draw a card.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []You may return a card from your Reserve to your hand.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} []You may have target Character or Expedition Permanent switch Expeditions.  {J} You may pay {1}. If you do: I gain 1 boost per card in your Reserve.
{H} You may discard a Character from your Reserve. If you do: Draw a card, otherwise [Resupply].  {R} []You may have target Character switch Expeditions.
{R} []You may have target Character or Expedition Permanent switch Expeditions.  At Dusk — You may pay {1}. If you do: Draw a card.
{H} []You may have target Character or Expedition Permanent switch Expeditions.  {R} []You may have target Character switch Expeditions.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []You may have target Character other than me lose [[Fleeting]].

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} []You may have target Character or Expedition Permanent switch Expeditions.  {H} You may have me gain [[Fleeting]]. If you do: I gain 1 boost.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []You may return a Spell from your Reserve to your hand.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} []You may have target Character switch Expeditions.  {H} If your Reserve is empty: You may send to Reserve target Character with Hand Cost {4} or more.
